name: American Rescue Helicopter Simulator 3D
description:
In American Rescue Helicopter Simulator 3D save city from burning fire with fire helicopter game. You are a part of firefighter team and you act like a fireman. Here you are a helicopter pilot and your mission is to save city from burning fire in this firefighting game simulator. Fly helicopter in this firefighter 3D simulator game for city rescue to save innocent lives. Save people in given time and become a real fireman hero of rescue games. Firefighters are always ready for all the burning fire challenges. Fire brigade rescues department works hard for fire rescue firefighting operations. Cooling down the fire with rescue helicopter is very difficult task. In American rescue helicopter simulator 3D extinguish fire in the city as your best. Here you have to use fire helicopter simulator instead of fire truck like other firefighter games and fire rescue helicopter games.

Get ready fire fighter game lovers to fly rescue fire helicopter to extinguish fire except fire engine simulation. This fire simulation game has different rescue fire missions which are very different to other fire helicopter games and firefighting games. Firemen are real rescue firefighter heroes they sacrifice their lives to save burning city and people from burning fire. American rescue helicopter simulator 3D gives you the opportunity to play brand new fire missions which you never played in other rescue games. You act like an American firefighter simulation game and save city to become rescue fire brigade hero. Fire fighting games are not very easy simulator games to play. This firefighter game test your skills how you fly fire helicopter to help people in rescue firefighter emergency game.

American Rescue Helicopter Simulator 3D Features: 
* Brand new fire missions with fire helicopter simulator rescue game
* Different firefighting stories to save city in this firefighter game
* Fly fire helicopter to save people from fire accidents as a helicopter pilot
* Stunning graphics and realistic controls of American rescue helicopter simulator 3D game
* Time based levels for the rescue games operations

You will enjoy real fun of this 3D firefighting games with ultra HD graphics. There are different fire fighter simulator game missions of rescue fire. Cool the burning fire down with fire helicopter in this rescue firefighter emergency game. American rescue helicopter simulator 3D game has real helicopter physics to fly helicopter simulator. This firefighter game is the best fire helicopter simulator of all the firefighting games 2018.
